revised_title: Edward Neville da Costa Andrade: A Pioneering Physicist and Educator
tldr: Edward Neville da Costa Andrade was a prominent physicist and educator who made significant contributions to the understanding of the flow of liquids and solids. His work on the mechanical properties of matter and nuclear physics earned him a place among the Fellows of the Royal Society. Andrade also had a passion for literature and history, which he incorporated into his life and work, making him a well-rounded and influential figure in the scientific community.
